section.title: Overview
section.para: This modules implements a dispatcher for destination addresses. It computes hashes over parts of the request and selects an address from a destination set. The selected address is used then as outbound proxy.
The module can be used as a stateless load balancer, having no guarantee of fair distribution.
The dispatcher module offers reloads on the fly using sercmd.

example.title: Destination List File
example.para: Each destination point must be on one line. First token is the set id and next is destination address. The set id must be an integer value. Destination address must be a valid SIP URI. Empty lines or lines starting with "#" are ignored.
